eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Hays; Travis; Williamson, TX; AT 01:02 PM ON SEP 29, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:02 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: City of Austin Emergency Management. This is a TEST of the City of Austin Emergency Alert System.  This tests our ability to send emergency messages directly to mobile devices. No action is required. THIS IS ONLY A TEST. You can visit www.ReadyCentralTexas.org for more information.
